briefTitle: Symptoms Experienced and Quality of Life in Breast Cancer Receiving Radiotherapy
officialTitle: Symptoms Experienced and Quality of Life in Patients With Breast Cancer Receiving Radiotherapy Across One Year
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* good consciousness
* ability to understand and provide information
* no hearing impairment
* Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance level of 0 to 2

Exclusion Criteria:

* prior radiotherapy
